title: Bookkeeping & Financial Oversight for $5K Cancer Awareness Marathon
summary: Review the marathon structure, entry fees, sponsorship commitments, and donation channels. Set up a bookkeeping framework with a secure ledger to track revenues, expenses (permits, logistics, marketing), and earmarked charity funds. Deliver a reporting workflow that ensures organizers can see progress in real time.
